name: clickertigrid
description: Conjunto de clases css para crear layouts responsive web y mobile first

scripts.rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('css/min/clickertigrid.css', 'css/min/clickertigrid.min.css', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('CSS file renamed with .min suffix!') })"
